docs.snippet: The World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA), which on Thursday declared Kenya non-compliant with its code, has told the East African country what areas of its anti-doping law need to be changed to meet requirements, Kenya's sports minister told local medi...
docs.lead_paragraph: The World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA), which on Thursday declared Kenya non-compliant with its code, has told the East African country what areas of its anti-doping law need to be changed to meet requirements, Kenya's sports minister told local media.

headline.main: Kenya Told by Anti-Doping Agency How to Fix Law - Minister
headline.print_headline: Kenya Told by Anti-Doping Agency How to Fix Law - Minister

docs.lead_paragraph: More than 600 men and women dressed in their Husker finery filed into the giant exhibition hall of the Platte County Agricultural Society. Hearty New York strips and pork loin were ready in the buffet line, the cash bar was open and a crowd was forming around the table where a Nebraska football season ticket was up for raffle.

headline.main: Riley Touring Nebraska to Stoke Interest in Huskers

docs.snippet: For much of the season, the Golden State Warriors and San Antonio Spurs seemingly were on a collision course. The teams with the two best records in the NBA were predestined to meet in the Western Conference finals, while the up-and-down Oklahoma ...
docs.lead_paragraph: For much of the season, the Golden State Warriors and San Antonio Spurs seemingly were on a collision course. The teams with the two best records in the NBA were predestined to meet in the Western Conference finals, while the up-and-down Oklahoma City Thunder were an afterthought.

headline.main: Thunder Dispatch Spurs, Advance to West Finals
